game.name: Cactus McCoy 2
game.description:
Created by Flipline Studios, Cactus McCoy 2 is a sequel to the worldwide recognized platform adventure game for boys. In this free online fighting game, you have to run, jump and fight against the strange creatures while running through the desert. Move on and collect the treasure of Calavera. With an improved look, Cactus McCoy 2 is ready to give the most challenging threat to their enemies they have ever faced. 

This epic treasure hunting journey is sure to provide you with a wonderful opportunity to meet with the most popular personality Ella Windstorm, known as the last of the winged Volador. It is pretty difficult to survive and reach your destination – the mythical Ruins of Calavera – when countless enemigos and wild bosses are out there to create unexpected hurdles on your way. You can find Ella with the help of new stats and weapons. 

This cool action game features amazing graphics and also helps to improve your hand-eye coordination power. The adventure you enjoyed in its first part continues with the second part - Cactus McCoy 2. Do not let your enemies make unwanted pressure on you. Only the better usage of your weapons and a full dedication can encourage you to win this flash game. One of the newest action games designed for boys, Cactus McCoy 2 can be easily played with the help of "W,A,S,D" and "Arrow Keys".

All the best to have a good time with our Cactus hero!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Cactus McCoy 2 at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
